description: A Flutter widget that provides a spacer, specifically a SizedBox with customizable height, used as a convenience widget for sliver sections in the UI.

classes.name: SectionSpacer
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that creates a vertical space in the UI with a specified height, defaulting to 12.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the spacer, returning a SizedBox with the specified height.
